title: Bringing Agents to GitHubMobile
likeCount: 19% increase in active Coding Agent users month over month
content: Bringing Agentic workflows to GitHub Mobile so developers can build and iterate on their ideas faster using coding agents and copilot code review. Designed Agent HQ, agentic workflows, and live activities for iOS and Android.

title: Fine Tuned Models
likeCount: 100k+ users showed an increase of 15% in acceptance rate
content: Designed the enterprise experience for custom fine-tuned models that enabled organizations to train Copilot on their codebases, internal libraries, and telemetry to delivery personalized code suggestions that match their specific coding standards and practices.

title: Copilot Extensions
content: Designed the chat experience for GitHub's extensibility platform, enabling developers to use third-party tools directly in Copilot Chat. Redesigned marketplace to support third party extensions and pricing models.

title: AI Storefront Chat
content: Designed proof of concept for Shopify Inbox's AI-powered storefront chat, helping merchants automate customer conversations. Focused on building trust through configurable settings like tone, branding, and handoff while driving activation.

title: Dashboard and Onboarding Experience
likeCount: 24% increase in engagement and 5% lift in activation
content: Redesigned the Mapbox dashboard and sign up flow to improve new user onboarding and reduce early-stage churn. Introduced personalized workflows and clearer entry points for key actions like adding data and styling maps.

title: A Digital Dream
content:
In circuits deep and code so bright,
Where pixels dance in endless light,
A dream unfolds on screens so wide,
Where creativity and logic coincide.

Through iterations, bugs, and breaks,
We craft the future that it takes,
With every line and every test,
We build the tools that serve us best.
